description: “Degenesis: Clan Wars,” a new board game from CMON, has quickly exceeded its crowdfunding target on Gamefound. This tactical-scale, asymmetric game for 2-5 players is set in a post-apocalyptic Europe in the year 2598. It offers players a chance to engage in a struggle for survival in a stark future where society teeters on the...
title: “Degenesis: Clan Wars” Achieves Rapid Funding on Gamefound

description: Fantasy Flight Games has announced the addition of the Nightcrawler Hero Pack to “Marvel Champions: The Card Game.” This new expansion introduces Nightcrawler, a character known for his teleportation abilities and association with the X-Men, as a playable hero. Nightcrawler, recognized for his distinct appearance and compassionate nature, brings a unique set of skills to...
title: Fantasy Flight Games Announces Nightcrawler Hero Pack for Marvel Champions: The Card Game

description: Thunderstone Quest, the acclaimed fantasy deck-building game designed by Mike Elliott, introduces its latest expansion, “Rise and Fall,” offering new dynamics and challenges for its players. This expansion adds two new Quests, enhancing the game’s adventure-driven gameplay with new dungeon tiles that introduce both challenges and rewards. Players of Thunderstone Quest start with a basic...
title: Thunderstone Quest Expands with “Rise and Fall” Expansion
